verses.verse: And it came to pass in those <S%H3117>days<s%>, when there was no <S%H4428>king<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, that there was a <S%H376>certain<s%> <S%H3881>Levite<s%> <S%H1481>sojourning<s%> on the farther <S%H3411>side<s%> of the <S%H2022>hill-country<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>, who <S%H3947>took<s%> to him a <S%H802>concubine<s%> out of <S%H1035>Beth-lehem<s%>-judah.

And his <S%H6370>concubine<s%> played the <S%H2181>harlot<s%> against <S%H3212>him<s%>, and went away from him unto her <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%> to <S%H1035>Beth-lehem<s%>-judah, and was there the space of <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H2320>months<s%>.

And her <S%H376>husband<s%> <S%H6965>arose<s%>, and <S%H3212>went<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H1696>her<s%>, to speak <S%H3820>kindly<s%> unto <S%H7725>her<s%>, to bring her again, having his <S%H5288>servant<s%> with <S%H6776>him<s%>, and a couple of <S%H2543>asses<s%>: and she <S%H935>brought<s%> him into her <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%>; and when the <S%H1>father<s%> of the <S%H5291>damsel<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H8055>him<s%>, he rejoiced to meet <S%H7125>him<s%>.

And his <S%H2859>father-in<s%>-law, the <S%H5291>damsel<s%>'s <S%H1>father<s%>, <S%H2388>retained<s%> <S%H3427>him<s%>; and he abode with him <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>: so they did <S%H398>eat<s%> and <S%H8354>drink<s%>, and lodged <S%H3885>there<s%>.

And it came to pass on the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>, that they arose <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%>, and he rose <S%H6965>up<s%> to <S%H3212>depart<s%>: and the <S%H5291>damsel<s%>'s <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto his <S%H2860>son-in<s%>-law, <S%H5582>Strengthen<s%> thy <S%H3820>heart<s%> with a <S%H6595>morsel<s%> of <S%H3899>bread<s%>, and <S%H310>afterward<s%> ye shall go your <S%H3212>way<s%>.

So they sat <S%H3427>down<s%>, and did <S%H398>eat<s%> and <S%H8354>drink<s%>, <S%H8147>both<s%> of them <S%H3162>together<s%>: and the <S%H5291>damsel<s%>'s <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H376>man<s%>, Be <S%H2974>pleased<s%>, I pray <S%H3885>thee<s%>, to tarry all night, and let thy <S%H3820>heart<s%> be <S%H3190>merry<s%>.
And the <S%H376>man<s%> rose <S%H6965>up<s%> to <S%H3212>depart<s%>; but his <S%H2859>father-in<s%>-law <S%H6484>urged<s%> <S%H3885>him<s%>, and he lodged there <S%H7725>again<s%>.

And he arose <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> on the <S%H2549>fifth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> to <S%H3212>depart<s%>; and the <S%H5291>damsel<s%>'s <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H5582>Strengthen<s%> thy <S%H3824>heart<s%>, I pray <S%H4102>thee<s%>, and tarry ye until the day <S%H3117>declineth<s%>; and they did <S%H398>eat<s%>, both of <S%H8147>them<s%>.

And when the <S%H376>man<s%> rose <S%H6965>up<s%> to <S%H3212>depart<s%>, <S%H6370>he<s%>, and his concubine, and his <S%H5288>servant<s%>, his <S%H2859>father-in<s%>-law, the <S%H5291>damsel<s%>'s <S%H1>father<s%>, <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3117>him<s%>, Behold, now the day <S%H7503>draweth<s%> toward <S%H6150>evening<s%>, I pray you tarry all <S%H3885>night<s%>: <S%H3117>behold<s%>, the day groweth to an <S%H2583>end<s%>, <S%H3885>lodge<s%> <S%H3824>here<s%>, that thy heart may be <S%H3190>merry<s%>; and <S%H4279>to-morrow<s%> get you <S%H7925>early<s%> on your <S%H1870>way<s%>, that thou mayest <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H168>home<s%>.

But the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H14>would<s%> not tarry that <S%H3885>night<s%>, but he rose <S%H6965>up<s%> and <S%H3212>departed<s%>, and <S%H935>came<s%> over <S%H5227>against<s%> <S%H2982>Jebus<s%> (the same is <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>): and there were with him a <S%H6776>couple<s%> of <S%H2543>asses<s%> <S%H2280>saddled<s%>; his concubine also was with <S%H6370>him<s%>.

When they were by <S%H2982>Jebus<s%>, the <S%H3117>day<s%> was <S%H3966>far<s%> <S%H7286>spent<s%>; and the <S%H5288>servant<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto his <S%H113>master<s%>, <S%H3212>Come<s%>, I pray <S%H5493>thee<s%>, and let us turn aside into this <S%H5892>city<s%> of the <S%H2983>Jebusites<s%>, and lodge in <S%H3885>it<s%>.

And his <S%H113>master<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H5493>him<s%>, We will not turn aside into the <S%H5892>city<s%> of a <S%H5237>foreigner<s%>, that is not of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; but we will pass <S%H5674>over<s%> to <S%H1390>Gibeah<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto his <S%H5288>servant<s%>, <S%H3212>Come<s%> and let us draw <S%H7126>near<s%> to <S%H259>one<s%> of these <S%H4725>places<s%>; and we will <S%H3885>lodge<s%> in <S%H1390>Gibeah<s%>, or in <S%H7414>Ramah<s%>.

So they passed <S%H5674>on<s%> and went their <S%H3212>way<s%>; and the <S%H8121>sun<s%> went <S%H935>down<s%> upon them <S%H681>near<s%> to <S%H1390>Gibeah<s%>, which belongeth to <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>.

And they turned <S%H5493>aside<s%> <S%H935>thither<s%>, to go in to <S%H3885>lodge<s%> in <S%H1390>Gibeah<s%>: and he went <S%H935>in<s%>, and sat him <S%H3427>down<s%> in the <S%H7339>street<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%>; for there was no <S%H376>man<s%> that <S%H622>took<s%> them into his <S%H1004>house<s%> to <S%H3885>lodge<s%>.

And <S%H935><s%>, behold, there came an <S%H2205>old<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> from his <S%H4639>work<s%> out of the <S%H7704>field<s%> at <S%H6153>even<s%>: now the man <S%H376>was<s%> of the <S%H2022>hill-country<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>, and he <S%H1481>sojourned<s%> in <S%H1390>Gibeah<s%>; but the <S%H582>men<s%> of the <S%H4725>place<s%> were <S%H1145>Benjamites<s%>.

And he lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> his <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, and <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H732>wayfaring<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> in the <S%H7339>street<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%>; and the <S%H2205>old<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Whither <S%H3212>goest<s%> <S%H370>thou<s%>? and whence comest <S%H935>thou<s%>?

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H5674>him<s%>, We are passing from <S%H1035>Beth-lehem<s%>-judah unto the farther <S%H3411>side<s%> of the <S%H2022>hill-country<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>; from thence am <S%H3212>I<s%>, and I went to <S%H1035>Beth-lehem<s%>-judah: and I am now <S%H1980>going<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; and there is no <S%H376>man<s%> that <S%H622>taketh<s%> me into his <S%H1004>house<s%>.

Yet there <S%H3426>is<s%> both <S%H8401>straw<s%> and <S%H4554>provender<s%> for our <S%H2543>asses<s%>; and there is <S%H3899>bread<s%> and <S%H3196>wine<s%> also for <S%H519>me<s%>, and for thy handmaid, and for the young <S%H5288>man<s%> that is with thy <S%H5650>servants<s%>: there is no <S%H4270>want<s%> of <S%H1697>anything<s%>.

And the <S%H2205>old<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H7965>Peace<s%> be unto <S%H7535>thee<s%>; howsoever let all thy <S%H4270>wants<s%> lie upon <S%H3885>me<s%>; only lodge not in the <S%H7339>street<s%>.

So he <S%H935>brought<s%> him into his <S%H1004>house<s%>, and gave the <S%H2543>asses<s%> <S%H1101>fodder<s%>; and they <S%H7364>washed<s%> their <S%H7272>feet<s%>, and did <S%H398>eat<s%> and <S%H8354>drink<s%>.

As they were making their <S%H3820>hearts<s%> <S%H3190>merry<s%>, <S%H582>behold<s%>, the men of the <S%H5892>city<s%>, <S%H582>certain<s%> <S%H1100>base<s%> <S%H582>fellows<s%>, <S%H5437>beset<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> round <S%H5437>about<s%>, <S%H1849>beating<s%> at the <S%H1817>door<s%>; and they <S%H559>spake<s%> to the <S%H1167>master<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%>, the <S%H2205>old<s%> <S%H376>man<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Bring <S%H3318>forth<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> that <S%H935>came<s%> into thy <S%H1004>house<s%>, that we may know <S%H3045>him<s%>.

And the <S%H376>man<s%>, the <S%H1167>master<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%>, went <S%H3318>out<s%> unto <S%H559>them<s%>, and said unto <S%H408>them<s%>, Nay, my <S%H251>brethren<s%>, I pray <S%H7489>you<s%>, do not so wickedly; <S%H310>seeing<s%> that this <S%H376>man<s%> is <S%H935>come<s%> into my <S%H1004>house<s%>, <S%H6213>do<s%> not this <S%H5039>folly<s%>.

Behold <S%H1323><s%>, here is my daughter a <S%H1330>virgin<s%>, and his <S%H6370>concubine<s%>; them I will bring <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H6031>now<s%>, and humble ye <S%H6213>them<s%>, and do with them what <S%H5869>seemeth<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> unto <S%H376>you<s%>: but unto this man <S%H6213>do<s%> not <S%H2063>any<s%> <S%H1697>such<s%> <S%H5039>folly<s%>.

But the <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H14>would<s%> not <S%H8085>hearken<s%> to <S%H376>him<s%>: so the man <S%H2388>laid<s%> hold on his <S%H6370>concubine<s%>, and <S%H3318>brought<s%> her <S%H2351>forth<s%> unto <S%H3045>them<s%>; and they knew <S%H5953>her<s%>, and abused her all the <S%H3915>night<s%> until the <S%H1242>morning<s%>: and when the <S%H7837>day<s%> began to <S%H5927>spring<s%>, they let her <S%H7971>go<s%>.

Then <S%H935>came<s%> the <S%H802>woman<s%> in the <S%H6437>dawning<s%> of the <S%H1242>day<s%>, and fell <S%H5307>down<s%> at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H376>man<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%> where her <S%H113>lord<s%> <S%H216>was<s%>, till it was light.

And her <S%H113>lord<s%> rose <S%H6965>up<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%>, and <S%H6605>opened<s%> the <S%H1817>doors<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%>, and went <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H3212>go<s%> his <S%H1870>way<s%>; <S%H802>and<s%>, behold, the woman his <S%H6370>concubine<s%> was fallen <S%H5307>down<s%> at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%>, with her <S%H3027>hands<s%> upon the <S%H5592>threshold<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H6965>her<s%>, Up, and let us be <S%H3212>going<s%>; but none <S%H6030>answered<s%>: then <S%H376>he<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> her up upon the <S%H2543>ass<s%>; and the <S%H376>man<s%> rose <S%H6965>up<s%>, and <S%H3212>gat<s%> him unto his <S%H4725>place<s%>.

And when he was <S%H935>come<s%> into his <S%H1004>house<s%>, he <S%H3947>took<s%> a <S%H3979>knife<s%>, and laid <S%H2388>hold<s%> on his <S%H6370>concubine<s%>, and <S%H5408>divided<s%> <S%H6106>her<s%>, limb by limb, into <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H5409>pieces<s%>, and <S%H7971>sent<s%> her throughout all the <S%H1366>borders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And it was <S%H1961>so<s%>, that all that <S%H7200>saw<s%> it <S%H559>said<s%>, There was no such <S%H2063>deed<s%> done nor <S%H7200>seen<s%> from the <S%H3117>day<s%> that the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> came <S%H5927>up<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>: <S%H7760>consider<s%> <S%H5779>it<s%>, take counsel, and <S%H1696>speak<s%>.
